title: Betwixt and Between - What do you think?
content:
This is my first attempt at designing a typeface. This is for an assignment in type class and I drew my inspiration from an R I saw on a headstone in a cemetary. The name comes from the fact that some of the letterforms are a combination of regular and small caps. I'm still working on a few of the letters...the Q, S, G, and O in particular...so any feedback is welcome. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font\_design.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424025204/http:/typophile.com/files/font_design_0.jpg) | 125.53 KB |
author: rebass20

comments.content:
As with the other cemetary font (your classmate?) this begs a lowercase. Not that you need that for your grade, but would make it much more useful. If there isn't time, I'd be even finishing off a few lowercase letters to show the feel would probably get you a better grade for extra effort (unless it doesn't work that way anymore)  
: )

The S is very nice, but it needs to gain some weight.  
The Y is... not working.
